entity.name: Thieves Guild
entity.entry:
This guild had a previous relationship with the [character:6801317] and the Little Shoppe which fenced stolen magical items for them, typically, from foreign lands. However, this relationship is not inheritable as the Thieves Guild trusts no one who hasn’t dipped their beaks into the seedy underbelly and dirty dealing of the city state. 

Working for the guild can gain you [ability:6801106|renown] and the associated business dealings

  • Dicky - Pickpockets and errand runners (one item at a time for 5%)
  • Scrounger - Petty schemers who lives by their wits (2-3 items for 10%)
  • Dodger / Receiver (fence) - Those who are good avoid trouble with the law. (40%)
  • Nitwit - used ironically, but these guys are planners of big schemes
  • King of Queen of Thieves - Only attainable by a rogue

Ways to Gain Renown

This guild, while not trusting, will grant renown for missions and for successfully selling items in the store up until they reach the level of Dodger/Receiver (10 pts) where the Little Shoppe has their full trust.
